description: Substitute Danny Johnson rescues a late point for Walsall as a closely-fought battle with fellow promotion chasers Doncaster ends 2-2.
title: Doncaster Rovers 2-2 Walsall
maintext:
Doncaster Rovers have lost four of their last five league games against Walsall (W1), though that sole victory did come in this exact fixture last season (2-1).
Walsall have won six of their last eight away Football League games against Doncaster Rovers (L2), scoring 2+ goals in each of those victories.
Doncaster have lost two of their last three league games played on a Tuesday (W1), as many as their previous 11 beforehand (W6 D3 L2).
Walsall have won just one of their last eight away league games (D4 L3), drawing their last four in a row since beating Morecambe 2-0 in February.
